email.title: Chobots Password
email.content:
Dear user, If you've received this letter it means that there was a request on your name to get accountsâ€™ password. If you didn't send the request, please ignore this letter.
Here is the list of chobot names / passwords that are registered on your e-mail address:
%1$s
Sincerely, Chobots Team
Please do not reply to this email
